languages.text: "Видит Терра, многие предметы обихода и устройства на корабле просто не предназначены для вашей комплекции и силы, многоуважаемый Ульфар".
"Oh, Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."
languages.original_text: "Видит Терра, многие предметы обихода и устройства на корабле просто не предназначены для вашей комплекции и силы, многоуважаемый Ульфар".

traits.locale_text: "Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."
"Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."
"Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."
"Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."

languages.text: “泰拉在上，飞船上的许多家居用品和设备根本不是为了你这样的体型和力量而设计的，乌尔法大人。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: “泰拉在上，飞船上的许多家居用品和设备根本不是为了你这样的体型和力量而设计的，乌尔法大人。”
“泰拉在上，飞船上的许多家居用品和设备根本不是为了你这样的体型和力量而设计的，乌尔法大人。”

languages.text: « Oh, par Terra, bien des objets et appareils du quotidien sur ce vaisseau ne sont pas adaptés à votre carrure et à votre force, seigneur Ulfar. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, par Terra, bien des objets et appareils du quotidien sur ce vaisseau ne sont pas adaptés à votre carrure et à votre force, seigneur Ulfar. »

languages.text: "Oh, Terra weiß, dass viele der Haushaltsgegenstände und -geräte an Bord schlicht nicht für Euren Körperbau und Eure Stärke gemacht sind, mein Lord Ulfar."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: "Terra weiß, dass viele der Haushaltsgegenstände und -geräte an Bord schlicht nicht für Euren Körperbau und Eure Stärke gemacht sind, mein Lord Ulfar."
"Terra weiß, dass viele der Haushaltsgegenstände und -geräte an Bord schlicht nicht für Euren Körperbau und Eure Stärke gemacht sind, mein Lord Ulfar."

languages.text: 「ああ、地球は知っている。船内の日用品や装置の多くは、ウルファー様の体格や体力に合うように設計されていないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: 「地球は知っている。船内の日用品や装置の多くは、ウルファー様の体格や体力に合うように設計されていないのだ」
「地球は知っている。船内の日用品や装置の多くは、ウルファー様の体格や体力に合うように設計されていないのだ」

languages.text: «Por Terra, muchos de los objetos y dispositivos cotidianos de la nave no están diseñados para alguien de su corpulencia y poderío, lord Ulfar».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: «Por Terra, muchos de los objetos y dispositivos cotidianos de la nave no están diseñados para alguien de su corpulencia y poderío, lord Ulfar».

languages.original_text: "Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."

languages.text: "Terra aşkına, gemideki neredeyse hiçbir gündelik eşya sizin gibi birinin yapısına ve gücüne göre tasarlanmadı lord Ulfar."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Terra knows, many of the household items and devices on board are simply not designed for your build and strength, my lord Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: "Terra aşkına, gemideki neredeyse hiçbir gündelik eşya sizin gibi birinin yapısına ve gücüne göre tasarlanmadı lord Ulfar."
